description: Per-system performance metrics, including CPU, memory, storage, I/O, and network.

panels.description: Current CPU usage, by 1m, 5m, and 15m load averages.
panels.title: Usage

panels.description: History CPU usage, by 1m, 5m, and 15m load averages.
panels.title: Usage History

panels.description: History of CPU usage, per core, as a stacked time series.
panels.title: Core Usage History

panels.description: Current available disk space, by mount point.
panels.title: Available Mount Space

panels.description: Total current I/O operation rates, over given range.
panels.title: I/O

panels.description: History of I/O operation rates, over given range.
panels.title: I/O History

panels.description: Total current network operation rates, over given range.
panels.title: Network

panels.description: History of network operation rates, over given range.
panels.title: Network History

panels.description: Total I/O operation data, over given range.
panels.title: I/O Data

panels.description: Total size of data received / sent, over given range.
panels.title: Network Data

list.description: VAST system from which to query metrics.
list.label: Server
list.name: server

title: System
